participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Alex is adventurous and free-spirited, with a strong passion for outdoor activities. He values personal freedom and enjoys exploring new trails on his bike.
participant_1.background: i don't drink alcohol. i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. my father was a construction worker. i hate the color pink. i'm a huge coffee lover.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Jamie is enthusiastic and eager to experience life. She is focused on her friendships and enjoys engaging in fun activities. She has a creative side that comes out through her drawings.
participant_2.background: i'm 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. i work took i've a part time job at burger king. they're constantly on my back. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i just want to have fun with my friends.

content.text: Hi, I am doing well. How are you?
i'm 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home.
Fine. Do you gave any pets?
No, I do not. I do like to mountain bike.
I like to kave fun with friends. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to mountain bike and draw.
I'm not a good drawer. What do you like to draw?
I like to draw and draw.
